name: At the End of the Disaster
name_original: At the End of the Disaster
description:
Its been 7-8 years since the war between the forces of light and darkness has ended.. The country of Arpeggio has deteriorated, some towns and villages never fully recovered from it, and the horrors of it still haunts the people of its country

Edel, a young girl, born at the end of the war between the forces of light and darkness, travels with her mother and father. They've been traveling the roads, homeless, for eight years in search of a new home.

"Move forward.. Relentlessly.."
